title: I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream
description: Harlan Ellison's classic short story "I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream" received a graphic novel adaptation by comics artist John Byrne. It was printed in issues 1-4 of Harlan Ellison's Dream CorridorÂ by Dark Horse; however, it was removed from future copies of the comic collection.
